entry.title: git学习小结
entry.content: &nbsp &nbsp Git是目前世界上最先进的分布式版本控制系统，版本控制系统，用最通俗的一个例子来说就是每次编辑与修改就会产生一个新版本，怎么能做到记录每次编辑与改动，这就是版本控制系统的作用。版本控制系统分为集中式和分布式

entry.title: Keep the House
entry.content: First of all , none can deny that the new things come from the old ones according to the natural rules. We all know that and that is why the humans grow up steps by steps. However ,as the ad says , ‘Nothing is impossible’ ,everything can make a change maybe just in next minutes even the rules. We need to learn make a balance between the old and the new one. As a witness of the old days,they knew the former styles and the every details how modern city break through the soil. There are uncountable people who come across those old building everyday. And we already get used to them even though sometimes we do not feel their accompany. Taking Siheyuan as an example ,this out-of-date building is our paradise and keep an unforgettable memory of our childhood. If possible ,everyone will choose to follow their hearts to keep the warm for themselves. Keeping the house is more than a simple slogan,but the deepest hope from heart. We have lost most of us on the development of humans,there need to be something remained ,not on the pics but on the real world.
